title: The actor Bando Mitsugoro IV as Kan Shōjō
marks:
Signature, Mark, and Inscription

[ 菅相丞 坂東 三津五郎  R/lower half: [ 国貞画 ] [Kunisada ga}
description: print in shades of blue with orange lightning bolts; man with ornately decorated, windblown robes and wild, windblown hair with hands bound and clasped at chest looking to PR; branch with blossoms in mouth; lightning striking around him
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
